projects.title: Aureo
projects.desc: A modern, minimalist e-commerce website concept designed to highlight products with elegance and clarity. Features include a responsive layout, product grid, product details page, cart system, and user authentication. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and integrated with a backend for product and cart management.

projects.title: Advice Generator
projects.desc: A small, interactive app that fetches and displays random advice with each click. Built to practice working with APIs, handling asynchronous requests, and creating a clean, minimal UI.

projects.title: Tip Calculator
projects.desc: A responsive tip calculator app that helps users quickly split bills and calculate tips. Focused on form handling, custom validation, and building an intuitive, mobile-friendly interface.

projects.title: Fylo Landing Page
projects.desc: A static, modern, and responsive practice project for Fylo, showcasing its features and call-to-action sections. Built with semantic HTML and CSS, it emphasizes clean layout, accessibility, and adaptability across devices.
